title: The wandring Jews chronicle: or The old historian his brief declaration made in a mad fashion of each coronation that past in this nation since William's invasion for no great occasion but meer recreation to put off vexation To the tune of, our Prince is welcome out of Spain.
author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?
publisher: Printed for Francis Grove on Snow-Hill,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
